title: A RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS (MGLB) THROUGH THE LOCAL CHIEF EXECUTIVE HONORABLE MAYOR NEIL ANDREW N. NOCON TO ENTER AND SIGN INTO A MEMORANDUM OF AGREEMENT (MOA) WITH THE JOLLIBEE GROUP FOUNDATION, INC., THROUGH ITS PROGRAM DIRECTOR AND THE FOUNDATION'S AUTHORIZED REPRESENTATIVE, FOR THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE BUSOG LUSOG TALINO (BLT) KITCHEN MODEL FOR THE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION'S SCHOOL BASED FEEDING PROGRAM (SBFP) AND OTHER COMMUNITY FEEDING ACTIVITIES AND RATIFYING THE SAME THEREAFTER,, Author Councilor Muriel Lai
